articles.author: Danielle Wiener-Bronner, CNN Business
articles.title: Jeff Bezos investigator: Saudi Arabia obtained private information - CNN
articles.description: An investigator working for Jeff Bezos to find out how evidence of his extramarital relationship with Lauren Sanchez was provided to the National Enquirer now claims that Saudi Arabia had access to information before the photos and texts were leaked.
